description.lang: -The NAW GW has a function to import picture and movie taken by smartphone.-It can also import the file stored in the flask deice directly to NAS GW via USB connection.-The user can watch the recorded video and listen to the music in the streaming playback on his/her smartphone over the home NW and even out of home remotely by au/KDDI LTE NW.-An IoT function is in the NAS GW as an IoT GW which enables the user to control IoT device from the external NW.
